examples: There's always a lot of traffic at this time of day.
Siempre hay mucho tráfico a esta hora del día.
There are currently delays of 40 minutes due to heavy traffic.
Actualmente hay retrasos de 40 minutos debido al tráfico intenso.
She left home early to avoid the rush-hour traffic.
Salió de casa temprano para evitar el tráfico de la hora punta.
The road will be closed to through traffic for eight weeks.
La carretera estará cerrada al tráfico durante ocho semanas.
